repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.abstract: This collection contains the alumni magazine of Tufts University. Tufts Magazine contains news about the university for alumni. It includes feature articles as well as news from alumni organizations and individuals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the alumni magazine of Tufts University. Tufts Magazine contains news about the university for alumni. It includes feature articles as well as news from alumni organizations and individuals. The Tuftonia replaced the Criterion as the official alumni magazine in 1994. The Tuftonia changed its name to Tufts Magazine beginning in Fall 2000.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged chronologically in one series, Tufts Magazine.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tufts Magazine, 1994 -- 2020. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains the alumni magazine of Tufts University. Tufts Magazine contains news about the university for alumni. It includes feature articles as well as news from alumni organizations and individuals. The Tuftonia replaced the Criterion as the official alumni magazine in 1994. The Tuftonian changed its name to Tufts Magazine beginning in Fall 2000.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: [Alumni relations] Up front: a letter from Ron Brinn; Adams, Benjamin C. (A88) Class notes; married Jennifer Goldsmith. p. 51.; Adams, Suzanne (Marcoux) (J67). Class notes. p. 45; Addleton, Jonathan (F82). Class notes. p. 48. [Admissions 1994] Apply yourself by disk. [Admissions 1994] Letter of response; aid should be help, not handout. Babak Alizadeh (A82, G85) and Elizabeth Alizadeh (Bergl) (J84) Class notes; announces birth of son. Susan L. Allen (J87) Class notes; married Dr. Andrew John Nelson. [Alumni 1994] Letter of response; aid should be help, not handout, p. 2. Keep class notes, p. 2. Jumbo's back, p. 5. Opening the door through admissions, p. 5. Talloires program for alums, p. 9. Jones, Bob; a Tufts ringleader, p.11. Recent activities of Tufts Alliance Network, p. 38-39. [Alumni 1994] Tales from Abroad, p. 29-31. Shapiro, Neal; an interview, p. 32, 33. Siegal, Adam; feeling "zooish" in Boston, p. 56.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: [Amalgamate] Something to sing about: The mates celebrate their tenth; [Alumni council] Jumbo fest; [Alumni 1994-95] Alumni Weekend '94, p. 27. [Alumni 1994-95] Learning doesn't end at graduations, p. 24, 53.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Dr. Sara J. Albertelli (E90), (M94) and Edward Lee ('91) Married on June 12. Dr. Hollis L. Albright ('27) Died. Edith Alexander (faculty) In Memoriam. Myron Allukian ('60) President of the American Board of Dental Public Health. Amy Almeida (88) Graduation Announcement, p.40.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ackerman, Raymond ('46) In memoriam. p. 45.; Addleton, Jonathan (F89) Baby announcement, November 2, 1994. Career Update. p. 39.; [Adzigian, Mark '88] Marriage announcement: September 4, 1994. p. 41. [Alaimo, Melissa '85] Baby announcement: March 8, 1994, 2 children. Virgil Alello ('63) Career information. Kelley Alessi (90) Career update. [Alfonso, Marita] (92) Career update.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This item was used in the spring 2012 reunion exhibit.
